org.sobotics.redunda

Class PingService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sobotics.redunda.PingService

  • public class PingService
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the connection to Redunda

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String apiKey
      The API-key for the current instance.
      PingServiceDelegate delegate
      The object that will be notified about status-changes.
      static java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean standby
      Stores if the bot should be on standby; true by default

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PingService()
      Initialize with default values
      PingService(java.lang.String key)
      Initializes the object with the api key
      PingService(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String botVersion)
      Initializes the object with the api key and bot-version
      PingService(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String botVersion, int pingInterval)
      Initializes the object with a `pingInterval` in seconds, the bot's verision and the api key

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DataService buildDataService()
      Returns a `DataService` with the same API-key as `PingService`
      boolean checkStandbyStatus()
      Fetches the current standby status synchronously from the server If an exception occurs, the status will be `true`.
      boolean getDebugging()
      Returns is PingService is in debugging mode.
      void setDebugging(boolean debug)
      Enables or disables the debugging mode.
      void start()
      Resets the executor services and starts pinging the server

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • apiKey

        public java.lang.String apiKey
        The API-key for the current instance. You can get the key in the Instances-overview on Redunda

      • delegate

        public PingServiceDelegate delegate
        The object that will be notified about status-changes.

      • standby

        public static java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean standby
        Stores if the bot should be on standby; true by default

    • Constructor Detail

      • PingService

        public PingService()
        Initialize with default values

      • PingService

        public PingService(java.lang.String key)
        Initializes the object with the api key
        Parameters:
        key - The API key for Redunda. You can get it form the instances overview

      • PingService

        public PingService(java.lang.String key,
                   java.lang.String botVersion)
        Initializes the object with the api key and bot-version
        Parameters:
        key - The API key for Redunda. You can get it form the instances overview
        botVersion - The version of your bot as string

      • PingService

        public PingService(java.lang.String key,
                   java.lang.String botVersion,
                   int pingInterval)
        Initializes the object with a `pingInterval` in seconds, the bot's verision and the api key
        Parameters:
        key - The API key for Redunda. You can get it form the instances overview
        botVersion - The version of your bot as string
        pingInterval - The time in seconds between two pings. (30 by default)

    • Method Detail

      • buildDataService

        public DataService buildDataService()
        Returns a `DataService` with the same API-key as `PingService`
        Returns:
        A `DataService`

      • setDebugging

        public void setDebugging(boolean debug)
        Enables or disables the debugging mode. If the debugging mode is activated, the bot will never be on standby.
        Parameters:
        debug - The new value

      • getDebugging

        public boolean getDebugging()
        Returns is PingService is in debugging mode.
        Returns:
        true, if debugging is enabled

      • start

        public final void start()
        Resets the executor services and starts pinging the server

      • checkStandbyStatus

        public boolean checkStandbyStatus()
        Fetches the current standby status synchronously from the server If an exception occurs, the status will be `true`. The value is affected by the debug-mode.
        Returns:
        The standby-status
